Powerful Features for Modern Web Intelligence

WebIntel combines cutting-edge AI with real-time web research to deliver comprehensive insights and actionable intelligence.

Real-time Web Research

Search across multiple engines (Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo) simultaneously for comprehensive and up-to-date information.

  • Multi-engine parallel search
  • Real-time data extraction
  • No predefined sources

AI-Powered Analysis

Leverage Google Gemini 2.0 Flash for intelligent content analysis, synthesis, and insight generation.

  • Google Gemini 2.0 Flash
  • Comprehensive analysis
  • Key insights extraction

Lightning Fast

Get comprehensive results in 15-20 seconds with optimized parallel processing and intelligent caching.

  • 15-20 second responses
  • Parallel processing
  • Optimized performance

Natural Language

Ask questions in plain English and get conversational, detailed responses with proper context and explanations.

  • Conversational interface
  • Context-aware responses
  • Detailed explanations

Source Attribution

Every response includes detailed source attribution with relevance scores and direct links to original content.

  • Detailed source links
  • Relevance scoring
  • Credibility assessment

CLI & Python API

Use WebIntel from command line or integrate into your Python applications with our comprehensive API.

  • Command line interface
  • Python API integration
  • Rich output formatting

Get Started in Minutes

Simple installation and powerful capabilities

Installation

1

Install WebIntel

pip install webintel
2

Set up API Key

export GEMINI_API_KEY="your-api-key"

Get your free API key from Google AI Studio

3

Start Researching

webintel search "AI trends 2024"

Requirements

  • Python 3.8 or higher
  • Google Gemini API key (free)
  • Internet connection

Live Example

webintel-demo
$ webintel search "Bitcoin price analysis today"

Real-World Examples

See WebIntel in action across different use cases

Academic Research

# Research latest AI developments
webintel search "machine learning breakthroughs 2024"
# Get comprehensive analysis
webintel search "climate change impact studies" --max-results 5
# Compare different perspectives
webintel search "renewable energy vs fossil fuels debate"

Financial Analysis

# Market analysis
webintel search "S&P 500 outlook 2024"
# Cryptocurrency research
webintel search "Bitcoin ETF approval impact"
# Economic indicators
webintel search "inflation trends Federal Reserve policy"

Technology Trends

# Latest tech developments
webintel search "quantum computing advances 2024"
# Programming trends
webintel search "Python vs JavaScript 2024 comparison"
# Startup ecosystem
webintel search "AI startup funding trends"

News Analysis

# Breaking news analysis
webintel search "latest international news today"
# Political developments
webintel search "US election 2024 updates"
# Global events
webintel search "G20 summit outcomes 2024"

Python API Integration

import
asyncio
from
webintel
import
DataProcessor, get_default_config
# Initialize WebIntel
async def
research_topic
(query):
config = get_default_config()
processor = DataProcessor(config)
# Get comprehensive analysis
result =
await
processor.process_query(query, max_results=
3
)
return
result
# Usage example
result = asyncio.run(research_topic(
"AI ethics guidelines"
))
print
(result[
'answer'
])

API Reference

Complete documentation for WebIntel's powerful API

CLI Commands

webintel search

Perform intelligent web research with AI analysis

webintel search "your query" [options]
--max-results

Number of sources to analyze (default: 5)

webintel search "AI trends" --max-results 3
--format

Output format: rich, json, plain (default: rich)

webintel search "news" --format json
--timeout

Request timeout in seconds (default: 60)

webintel search "data" --timeout 30

webintel config

Manage WebIntel configuration

webintel config set-key YOUR_API_KEY
webintel config show
webintel config reset

Python API

DataProcessor

Main class for processing web intelligence queries

class
DataProcessor
:
"""AI-powered data processor"""
def
__init__
(self, config):
self.config = config
process_query(query, max_results=5)

Process a query and return comprehensive analysis

Parameters:
‚Ä¢ query (str): The search query
‚Ä¢ max_results (int): Maximum number of sources to analyze

Returns: Dict with 'status', 'sources', 'answer', 'analysis'

Configuration

from
webintel
import
get_default_config
config = get_default_config()
config.gemini.api_key =
"your-api-key"
config.gemini.model_name =
"gemini-2.0-flash-exp"

Response Format

{
"status"
:
"success"
,
"query"
:
"your query"
,
"sources"
: [
{
"title"
:
"Source Title"
,
"url"
:
"https://..."
,
"domain"
:
"example.com"
,
"relevance_score"
:
0.95
}
],
"answer"
:
"Comprehensive AI response"
,
"response_time"
:
16.2
}

Error Handling

API Key Missing

Set GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable

Rate Limiting

Automatic retry with exponential backoff

Network Issues

Graceful fallback to available sources

Performance Tips

  • Use specific queries for better results
  • Limit max_results for faster responses
  • Cache results for repeated queries
  • Use async/await for better performance
